channel.title: New Series on UN-aligned
channel.description: Recent content in New Series on UN-aligned

item.title: Celebrity islands with the United Nations
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description: Many may not know, but the United Nations is the creator of some of the worst “reality TV” of all time. This is The Gordian Magazine’s review of United Nations events as if they were reality TV.
